choices: Some part of her body grew
Some part of her body shrank
1.content:
Once every year grows a very strange and wonderful flower. It's quite different from that of a typical flower: all its petals are different colors, sort of like a rainbow. It's also resistant to over-watering, bug bites, pesticide, and even fire. The flower blooms for a month before it withers away completely, and its location changes each time: the sole seed it leaves after death is so small, it can't be viewed with anything but a microscope. It needs very little water and sunlight to live, so it can grow anywhere at any time...even on mountains and underwater.

Its newest location just happened to be in the same spot as young, spirited 19 year-old Laura Carley. The energetic girl had her short brown hair covered with a hat to protect her from the sun's rays, and she was sporting a pink tank-top and light blue shorts while on her daily walk, holding a water bottle in her right hand and her iPod in her left. Usually she enjoyed the outdoors, but the recent summer weather prevented her from going outside too much until today, where it was a much cooler 75 degrees outside. The reason for this concerns the pollen level: ever since Laura was a little girl, she sneezed from sniffing most flowers. In fact, one of the very few plants that didn't cause her to sneeze were cacti, which she kept 3 or 4 of at home in her windowsill, watering them every day. As the joyous woman continued her walk, she noticed the previously mentioned rainbow flower. The first thing she did was sit on the grass on her butt to get a better look.

"I've never seen a flower quite like this before", Laura said to herself as she gently plucked out the flower from the ground and took out her headphones from her iPod. She then slowly sniffed the flower, wondering whatever or not she was allergic. Much to her surprise, though, she didn't feel a thing. No sneezing, no watering eyes, nothing. Curious about the flower still, Laura quickly stood on her feet again (the flower still in her hand) and ran back home.

---

About 10 minutes had passed for Laura by the time she headed back home. She sprinted from the door straight to her bedroom on the second floor. Her room was right to the left of her brother's, with light blue walls, a drawer in the upper left corner of the room for clothes, her bed on the upper right, her TV on the bottom right corner, and her CD player and school bag on the bottom left. And in the middle of the farthest back wall was the window, which her cacti were currently residing. Laura quickly got out a flower pot and dirt from one of said cacti and placed the flower in it as soon as she could. She then poured a tiny bit of water from her water bottle on the rainbow-colored flower's dirt, as well as a little on the flower itself. The flower seemed to sparkle a little bit afterwards.

"Wow. It's so pretty", Laura smiled at the flower, admiring its beauty. She then left her room and quickly went downstairs to get a replacement pot for her cactus she took out to make room for the flower. Right after getting the pot, though, Laura's eyes started to water, and her nose started to itch.

"Uh-oh...another sneeze is coming on..", Laura told herself as her eyes watered even more, seconds away from a mere sneeze. She tried her hardest to hold it in, but to no avail. She then snorted soon afterwards, her eyes still closed from the sneeze. As she moved around her fingers and body, though, she felt...different somehow. Like a part of her body had changed size.

Unfortunately for Laura, the rainbow-petaled flower she found earlier was not your typical, run-of-the-mill flower. When wet, it caused nervous allergic reactions that can actually change at random the size of a person's body part. ANY of them. Hair, legs, head, eyes...you name it. But did a body part of Laura grow, or did it shrink?
1.title: Laura and the Rainbow Flower

choices: Her hair
Her chest
Her legs
Her hands
Her butt
11.content: As Laura slowly opened her eyes, she was surprised to find out that she grew in some part of her body! But which part?
11.title: Laura's Uneven Growth

choices: Nope. Another part of her body grows
Nope. A part of her body shrinks
False alarm. Laura calls her boyfriend
111.content:
Laura proceeded to open her eyes, only to see nothing but darkness in front of her.

"Oh no! I've gone blind!" the woman cried as she placed her hands on her head and covered her eyes. As she did so, though, she felt something...hairy. After a lengthy time of removing the hair from her eyes, Laura found out that her hair simply grew from the allergic reaction...her eyesight was perfectly fine. Still, though, this wasn't much better.

Laura quickly ran back up to her room and checked out her mirror. She was quite amazed that her hair was now over 8 feet long! Not only was her hair longer, but it was richer and prettier, too. Laura proceeded to quickly grab her scissors and, in a gradual process involving clipping one side of her face at a time, managed to clip all the hair around her face area to once again see clearly once again.

Laura was still confused by the recent growth of her hair, though. She decided to look at the rainbow flower once again and see if something wasn't up with it. Hair doesn't grow quite that fast, right? At least that's what she thought to herself. Unfortunately, she made the mistake of sniffing the flower once again, and felt another sneeze coming on. Perhaps Laura catches a break and the sneeze was a false alarm?
111.title: Rapunzel, eat your heart out!

choices: Laura calls up Dave
Laura keeps it a secret
Laura sneezes again before making her decision
1111.content:
Despite her hoping against it, Laura found herself sneezing once again, worried about what could possibly be growing next. It wasn't her legs...she would've bumped into the ceiling if that were the case. It wasn't her arms or hands, because she could still move them normally. Then what was it? It took a very short trip to the mirror to realize that her chest was the next part of her body to grow.

Laura wasn't exactly what you call a woman with a nice chest. In fact, her bust was a modest 32 inches, practically unchanged from her sophomore year in high school. This, coupled with her short hair, didn't exactly make Laura stand out among her peers. However, the short hair was a necessity on the swim team back in her high school days, as Laura hated putting her hair in a bun and preferred cutting it so her hair fit better in a swim cap. Laura seldom let her hair touch her neck even after high school, and she still had it cut every other 3 to 4 weeks to this day.

But things were different now. Laura now had a beautiful, very long head of pretty, curly brown hair, and her chest was now at least 10 inches bigger than it was previously. Although the chest was quite taxing on her body, Laura felt pretty for the first time in her life. The giddy woman was actually looking forward to what the next sneeze would bring her: a bigger butt, taller, skinnier legs, bigger hands. Anything. The excited woman almost took another whiff of the flower before asking herself something, smiling as she did so:

"Should I show Dave this?"
1111.title: Even adults can still grow

choices: Dave
Laura's next door neighbor, a young boy
11111.content:
Her mind still excited about her new hair and chest sizes, Laura immediately called up Dave and asked him to come over right away. The confused boyfriend of hers was wondering what the woman was so happy about, but all she told him was that it was a big surprise and that there would be "more of her to love". Confused by this cryptic (to him) message, Dave told Laura he would be there in 15 minutes, which was okay by Laura since she had more hair to cut off before he could come.

It wasn't as easy as it sounded, though: Laura's hair was quite thick. She couldn't even tell where her hair ended, much less where to cut it. Taking the same pair of scissors she previously cut her hair with, Laura then spend the next 10 minutes or so snipping at any hair below her butt, which was quite a formidable task as she had 8 feet of long, curly, brown hair to plow through. Although she did (eventually) manage to cut all the hair off below her butt, the results were less than satisfactory: her hair looked it was caught in a lawnmower or vacuum cleaner.

"Oh well", Laura sighed as she proceeded downstairs to get herself something to drink from the fridge. She pulled out a can of Pepsi when she heard the front door ring. Excited as to who it could be, Laura placed the can off Pepsi down on the kitchen table and dashed to the door.

"I didn't think he'd come THIS soon", an excited Laura said to herself as she opened up the house's big, light blue door. But who was it?
11111.title: Laura just wants to have fun

choices: She sneezes and grows somewhere
She sneezes and shrinks somewhere
No sneeze, nothing happens
1112.content:
Much to Laura's chagrin, she found herself sneezing once again, worried awaited her following the next sneeze. Afterwards she inched her way to her mirror to see that she no longer could move her hands around! It seems that her arms had shrunk from the previous sneeze, and her hands felt like gigantic weights on her 4 inch long arms. Laura quickly proceeded to her bed and placed her hands on her pillow to avoid hurting them all the more.

"This is just getting weird", the confused woman laughed to herself. "I guess that's the price of long, beautiful hair, though." Her eyes then proceeded to look at her windowsill once again, where the beautiful flower with the rainbow petals sat in its little, brown clay pot. Laura was soon to discover that this was no ordinary flower...it was magical! So magical that it could change the size of an ordinary adult even! The kind of discovery that could get Laura fame...or ridicule. Noticing her 4 inch long arms and her 8 feet of hair, she decided that until her body was in more stable alignment, she couldn't even lift anything, much less walk leave her bed. Her only idea was to wait until either the rest of her body shrank, the rest grew to match her long hair, or until at least her arms could support the weight of her hands again. And Laura felt a sneeze coming on again, too.
1112.title: What goes up must go down

choices: Laura falls alseep on the couch
Laura hears the doorbell ring
11121.content:
When Laura was little, she was one of the smartest girls in her class as well as her grade. Her teachers were delighted by whatever work she handed in, and not once in her elementary, junior high, and high school years did she fail or come close to failing a class in school. Although her academic progress slowed down in high school, Laura was still in the top 20% of her grade every semester of every year. She graduated with the 50th highest average out of 300 graduates, even. She even had the nickname of "Laura Big-Head" in high school, which to her was both a compliment and a really goofy way of referring to her.

So it came to no surprise to Laura to find out that her next growing body part was her head. Funny enough, though, her arms were now their normal size, but her hair was still long, and her head (including her eyes, nose, mouth, and ears) was now thrice its original size. As Laura walked up to the mirror to examine herself, she felt like she was carrying a bowling bowl for a head. She had to use both her hands just to keep it balanced and not have her head fall on the ground. She then sneezed as she looked (and giggled) at herself in the mirror, her arms and hands now twice their original size. Her now giant hands were at one with the floor below her.

"Monkey woman", a confused Laura told herself while looking at the mirror still, thinking that her new proportions made her look a little like a monkey. Her arms were now almost as long as her room, and the growing woman tried to experiment with her new, longer arms to see if she could lift them. To her surprise she could, but not nearly as high as before: she had a hard time lifting them above a 30 degree angle. At least Laura could stand up again, and the woman proceeded down the stairs and to her living room, hiding her longer arms and hands in a blanket as she cuddled on the couch and watched T.V. She used her thick, long hair as a pillow of sorts as she sat down on her side on the couch and started flipping through the channels for something good to watch.
11121.title: People said she had a big head, but...

choices: Run away from the onlookers
Tell them to stop taking pictures of her
111211.content:
Laura felt sleepy after her walk, so the sleepy giantess in the making decided to rest on the couch as a rerun of "Happy Days" played in front of her as she slept. She dreamed about being as tall as a skyscraper, her body continually expanding part by part until she was not only taller than the town, but of Earth itself as well! She dreamed of becoming so big that planets and moons started orbiting around her like she was her own solar system!

Snapping out of her dream several hours later, Laura yawned as she noticed a significant change in her body. In addition to her big head, long hair, and long arms and hands, her butt had elevated the woman to the stop of the ceiling (her couch long destroyed while asleep), and her breasts had to at least be two feet tall each. As the now naked Laura proceeded to sneeze again, her hair grew even longer, filling up almost the rest of the room that her gigantic body hadn't already covered up! It had to at least be 20 feet long now. A second sneeze resulted in her stomach growing several times in size, followed by a third sneeze that resulted in the growth of her feet and legs, now at least four times longer than they were before! When all was said and done, Laura had destroyed her house just by trying to move her body around. Once she broke free of her crumbled abode, the naked giantess proceeded to look around her significantly smaller surroundings.

Laura did the math in her head to determine how much she had grown since first sniffing the flower. Her legs were already about 4 feet long, and after the growth they were now at least 17 feet long. Her feet grew 4 times their size as well, boosting her height up by at least 9 or so inches. Her stomach and neck areas combined were at least five times its normal size, adding an extra 10 or so feet to her increased height. And finally her head was three times its normal size, adding an extra 4 or so feet to her. Adding up the math, Laura had to at least 32 feet tall, give or take a few feet. She was stunned by her new size, and used her long hair to cover up her privates, glad that it grew to such a long length. Unsurprisingly, the naked giantess attracted quite a few males to her attention, who quickly took out their cameras and cell phones and started taking pictures of the naked giantess Laura. What does she do now?
111211.title: I dream of giantess

choices: Continue Laura's story
I wonder who finds the flower next!
1112111.content:
Laura had never been so embarrassed in her life. This was worse than someone seeing her naked in the shower: this felt like the whole town was seeing her getting out of said shower all at once! So embarrassed that she could cry, Laura ran away from the town using her gigantic feet to cover whole dozens of feet in distance in a manner of steps. She was too worried about her naked body to remember that she forgot about the flower that made her big in the first place which, surprisingly, survived the crumbling down of her house.

Curious as to what happened, a passerby happens to stumble upon the flower and wonder what it was, thinking it was very pretty. Of course, there's still the wondering of what happened to the crying, embarrassed giantess Laura. Do you want to focus back on her, or do you want to perhaps see what happens when another person stumbles upon the flower?
1112111.title: No pictures of the naked giantess, please!

choices: Cory tells his father about the ride he got from Laura
Matthew asks Laura what exactly she is
11121111.content:
Not even attempting to look back as she left behind her town, Laura ran as far she could from the town, stepping on many smaller, pointier objects in her way in the process (making her wish she was more careful with her running). The naked giantess found herself stopping at the town lake, quickly dunking her entire body in it. Thankfully the lake was still big enough for her to hide her body in it, but she was soon spotted by a boy no older than 3 or 4 years old. He had short, blonde hair, green eyes, and was wearing a blue short-sleeved shirt and beige pants, a plain white cap sitting atop his head.

"Oh crap...I hope I don't scare him", Laura said to herself as the boy continued to glance at her as she dunked all but her head into the fairly warm lake. To her surprise he showed no fear: in fact, he started walking over to the water to get a better look at her, extending his hand out to her. Laura was amazed at the boy's lack of fear as she extended her hand out to him in return, then placing the boy on the top of her head. She then rode across the lake with the boy on top of her head, who used Laura's hair as a seatbelt of sorts as she rode too and from the lake area. After a few minutes of traveling she placed the boy safely back on land.

"Thank you", the boy smiled to the girl, whose father had just returned from the forest nearby to get some firewood. It appears the young boy was told to wait there for his father to return with the firewood from nearby, as the father and son were camping near the lake area. The father was about 30 or so years old, with a full head of brown hair, green eyes, and wore an attire consisting of a brown jacket (with a red t-shirt underneath) and black sweat pants. Unlike his son, though, the father was quite shocked by the naked giantess in the lake, speechless as to how to respond. Laura, too, was speechless in how to respond to the boy's father, worried that he would report her to the police. But the man attempted to be calm around the giantess as much he could before finally introducing himself as Matthew McCohern. He then introduced his son, Cory, who bowed to the woman as he addressed her.

"Nice to meet you", she smiled to the two, feeling a little better now about being spotted by the two.
11121111.title: Escape to the lake!

choices: Help her
Exploit her
111211112.content:
Laura explained everything to the man and his son that happened to her that day. The growing, the shrinking, the flower...everything. Unsurprisingly, Matthew wasn't believing a word the giant woman said to him, but his son ate it down like ice cream.

"Must be really scared", the little boy said to Laura, looking sad as he told her this. "Where you going to live now?"

"I don't really know, Cory", Laura sighed to him as she looked teary-eyed. Not from tears, mind you, but because she felt another sneeze, ducking her body further into the water in fear as to what was going to happen. "Uh-oh...it's happening again.."

"What is!?" Matthew asked, very concerned.

"My sneezing...the flower's effects must still be working on me..", the annoyed woman cried as she then sneezed in front of the two, a sneeze so loud they could actually feel the air from her mouth on them. After the sneeze, Laura found her once tall feet their normal size again, giving her a little bit more room in the lake. However, this also meant she had to sit stomach down in the lake so as to not squish her tiny (in comparison to the rest of her) feet.

"Now do you believe me, Cory's father? Or do I need to sne..ah..ah..AHCHOO!" And with that, another sneeze came out of Laura, shrinking her once gigantic hands to their normal size as well. Laura seemed happy by the slowly increasing room she had, but could she fix it all up before another passer-by looks at her? Meanwhile, Matthew was completely floored by what he saw...to him, this was the equivalent of finding Bigfoot. Does he help poor Laura out, or exploit her for his own gain?
111211112.title: Laura and the Lake

choices: "No thanks. You've done more than enough to help me."
"Do you have something to hide my appearance?"
1112111121.content:
"So you sneeze to shrink, right?" Matthew asked Laura as she wiped her nose with her arm, wishing she had a tissue right about now. "Does it have to be specific thing to make you grow and shrink from sneezing, or is it general sneezing?"

"I never actually found that out", she explained to the father in reply. "Why? Do you have something that can help make me sneeze?"

"Indeed I do", he replied as his son brought over his yellow duffle bag and pulled out a case of pepper. Cory then placed the case right near the water as he watched Laura grab it with her human-sized hands and proceeded to spray its contents in the area near her face. She waited for a sneeze to come on, but even after a few minutes there were no results.

"I'm sorry, but it doesn't seem to be working", Laura apologized, bowing her head down to Matthew, parts of her hair blocking the man's view of the lake around him. "Thank you for the help, though."

"Well, I seemed to notice you sneezed earlier when I didn't believe that you sneezed to shrink and grow..and you know what? I still don't believe you!" This caused Laura to be stunned and surprised! She had even already shown the man proof she changed size by sneezing, and he still didn't believe her. Laura seemed quite surprised, on the verge of tears even.

"But it's the trut...AH-AH-AHCOO!!" she went as she proceeded to sneeze once again. Laura's once very tall legs then returned to their original size, as did her arms. Now all that was left was her butt, stomach, chest, hair, and head. The weight of her head causing her to tip over, Laura found herself waiting for her to come to shore, firmly planting her head on the more dry soil near Matthew and Cory.

"Oh, I see! You did that to make me sneeze again", the cheerful sounding Laura said to Matthew, understanding hiss earlier skepticism. "Thanks."

"You're welcome. I didn't want to see you get caught by the police or the FBI or Area 51 or whatever would happen if they saw you."

"I still have a bit of shrinking left, though. Can I count on you and your son to help me?" the worried looking woman said to them, still surprised that she didn't get caught earlier.

"Sure thing, but keep low on another side of the lake until then...faker", Matthew snickered to the woman, causing her to get upset again. Now he was doing this on purpose, Laura thought to herself. It still made her a little annoyed, even though Matthew was only trying to help the poor girl out.

"Hey, that's not funnEH-AH-AHCHOO!" Laura yelled at the man before she sneezed once again, this time her head shrinking back to its normal size.

"Sorry once again, but hey! At least you can hide your body in the water now...kind of. Want us to help you out, Laura?" Matthew asked of her. Cory then repeated what his father said, albeit not as intelligible.
1112111121.title: Your Friendly Neighborhood Father

choices: Focus on Jonathon
Focus on Alicia
11121112.content:
You have two choices as to who finds the flower next:

1.) A man:

Called in to see the investigation, 30 year-old black police officer Jonathon Dowe is on duty to see the falling debris that was Laura's house once. He finds the rainbow flower in the debris during said duty, which was surprisingly intact from the fallen house. While the other officers are on the scene wondering what caused such a thing (and listening to reports about a "giant woman" being the cause of the house's destruction), he decides to take it from the scene and present it as a gift to his wife for their fifth wedding anniversary tomorrow.

2.) A girl:

Long before the police arrive on the scene, a 15 year-old girl stumbles upon the flower while walking her dog. Her name is Alicia Bertingson, and she was the only daughter of a fairly rich family who adored flowers, so much that they made a flower garden in their backyard. The excited Alicia, noticing how pretty the flower is, decides to take it home to show her mother and father the rainbow flower.
11121112.title: The flower's next victim...

choices: Some part of Alicia's body grew
Some part of Alicia's body shrank
111211122.content:
Long before the police arrived on the scene (and about 20 minutes after Laura the upset giantess left the scene), a beautiful young girl was walking around the neighborhood. Sporting pretty, medium-length brown hair that went down to her shoulders, pretty blue eyes, a white hat, and a pretty, light blue dress that went down to her knees, the girl was surprised to see the beautiful rainbow flower on the ground before her on her walk, undamaged from the crumbled remains of what was once Laura's house. The young girl's name was Alicia Bertingston, and she was surprised to see such a lovely flower before her lying down on the ground, right outside of its pot.

"I'll save you", she giggled to herself as she placed the flower back in the pot, soon putting the fallen door back into it. Thinking that the flower looked a little dry, Alicia then decided to take out the 20-ounce water bottle from her red purse and poured about an ounce or two of liquid into the pot. She then took a whiff of the flower, admiring the wonderful smell it gave off.

"There you go", she said to the flower as she held it with both her hands, amazed by its beauty. "I know! I'll show to Mother and Father. Won't be they surprised to see you? Maybe they'll left you stay in our garden."

Alicia then started to run back to her house, which wasn't easy in her black, high heel shoes. After a few minutes of running she approached her house, which was one of the nicest looking houses in all of the city. It was two stories high, standing about 20 or so feet tall. Its paint job was white, and the door was painted light blue, with a carpet rub with the words "Welcome to the Bertingston Household" written on it. To the left of the front door was a porch big enough for three people, and behind the house was a backyard about 20 square feet long altogether. All kinds of beautiful flowers grew in that backyard, from petunias, carnations, and chrysanthemums, to lotus flowers, eudicots (including forget-me-nots and buttercups), and many others.

Too excited to await planting of the flower, Alicia quickly ran to the backyward and planeted the rainbow-petaled flower on the ground to the far left of the rest of the garden (so as to not block the sunlight or water of the other flowers). Once again she sniffed the flower upon burying it in the dirt, which was one of the best smelling flowers her nose ever laid upon. She felt a little odd after the second sniff, though..

"I feel...like a sneeze is coming on", Alicia said as she itched her nose mere seconds before the sneezing commenced. "Ah..ah...AH-CHOO!" Her eyes closed right before sneezing, Alicia was yet unaware of the rainbow flower's ability to grow or shrink a part of a person's body at random. But what ended up being the case for the young girl?
111211122.title: Alicia finds the flower

Not only that, but her panties felt very tight on her body as well. One quick look at the ground below her revealed that Alicia's legs had grown to over 20 extra feet in height, and her feet were several times their size as well (her feet slipping out of her heels long ago). Needless to say, she was shocked.

"Oh my!" were Alicia's first words. "This is like 'Alice in Wonderland' all of a sudden. But that was a dream...so, of course, this is as well. Heheheh...heh..." Laughing in denial about her recent growth dilemma, Alicia proceeded to sit down on the ground below her, being careful not to hurt the fence in front of her with her big feet. She couldn't go inside on account of her longer legs not fitting through the hallways, and she certainly couldn't hide them very long from her parents or neighbors. It was then that Alicia stared at the flower she had recently inquired. Unlike Laura, she knew right away that the cause of her growth was somehow related to it.

"Well, if the flower made my feet bigger..perhaps it can shrink me as well?" Alicia said to herself as she sniffed the rainbow flower in the garden once again, waiting for something to happen. After a few attempts she finally caught a second sneeze, with the results this time being that...

Her parents

As Alicia proceeded to sneeze again, she felt her butt chafing, as if something was stuck really tight in it. Turns out that her next growth was for her butt, which grew over six times is regular size. However, since the growth of her legs and feet, the young giantess in the making was still able to stand up properly despite her recent growth. This also started tearing at her dress, however, and slowly she heard a short series of rips and tears on her fairly expensive dress.

"Maybe Bryan can help.He has an older sister who's majoring in science in her college classes. Maybe she would know?" the 26 foot tall (albeit mostly in the legs) Alicia asked herself as she headed down to her friend's house, hurrying in an attempt not to be seen.

Just then, though, the girl trips over a pothole in the sidewalk, falling down directly on her stomach. Dazed by thee very tall fall due to her longer legs, Alicia had several scrapes with the sidewalk turf below her, and her left foot was stuck in the pothole as well.

"Just my luck", Alicia groaned as she tried to pull out her foot by itself, her hands too small to aid her. As she tried to pull it out, she found someone walking down the sidewalk. It was someone (or some people) she knew very well, too.
11121112211.title: Not what they mean by "growth spurt"

They run away to the outskirts of town
111211122111.content:
It was Alicia's guy friend, Bryan. About five foot nine in height, the blonde-haired, hazel-eyed guy with a fairly muscular build was still in his basketball uniform from school, which consisted of a light blue sleeveless shirt and dark blue shorts.

"Alicia....what happened to you? Are you wearing some sort of weird stilts?" he hesitated to ask as his friend starting standing up, her foot finally out of the pothole in the sidewalk. When she finally stood straight up, he was amazed at what he saw...in more ways that one.

"I didn't know you wore panties with strawberries on them...", Bryan, um, observed, much to a greatly embarrassed Alicia, who tried to cover her panties with her hands (which didn't work out very well).

"Seriously, though, how'd you get so big, Alicia?!"

"F-f-flower..."

"Hmm? Flower?"

"I found a...flower today. When I gave it a whiff, it caused me to sneeze. And now every time I sneeze I get bigger...and bigger...an-AH-AH-AH-CHOO!" And before Laura could say anything, her hands grew to thrice their original size. Both saddened and frustrated, Alicia began to sit on the ground on her knees, crying through her now gigantic hands.

"Alicia..."

Bryan wanted to comfort his growing friend, but he was too afraid by what he was saying. In fact, he was still under the illusion that everything he's seeing is just an illusion, even though it wasn't.

"Help me, Bryan! I don't want to become a gigantic freak!" she continued to cry, her tears dripping down from her tears to the ground below her. But how was a regular sized boy supposed to help a growing giantess in the making?
111211122111.title: Boy meets Giantess (in the making)

choices: Alicia still wants to move forward
Alicia agrees with Bryan and settles down for the night
1112111221112.content:
Alicia had no choice: she had to run away from home. And she decided to take her friend Bryan with her. But before she did, she sneezed again, shrinking her butt too!

"Just shrink the rest of me already", she sighed as she began to cry a bit. "I don't care anymore.."
11121112221222.title: More shrinking, no helping

choices: It is.
It is not, and Alicia breaks her leg.
111211122212221.content:
Alicia then had two quick sneezes, and her head and waist shrunk as well, leaving her about 5-6 inches tall in her now giant shirt. Wrapping herself in one of the undershirt's sleeves as a makeshift dress, she walked over to the edge of the bed and gasped. She didn't realize how high up it was..

"If I ever return to my normal size, I'm putting my bed closer to the floor", she said to herself, nodding with her own suggestion.

She then looks at her long-sleeved undershirt, thinking of pulling on it as far out as she can to the floor, using it like a pole to the ground.

"Too bad I'm not smaller, or I could use my panties as a parachute!" Alicia laughed to herself as she started down to the floor. Is it a safe journey down, though?
111211122212221.title: Alicia in Big Room Land

choices: Her parents
Bryan
1112111222122212.content:
Alicia falls flat on the floor from a decent distance up still, and falls butt first on the ground. In the process she also breaks her right leg, though she wouldn't notice right away. She then pulls up one of her socks from her shrunken feet and wraps it around her, trying not to breathe in with her nose. The sock fell off as Alicia tried standing up, her broken leg knocking her back to the floor.

"OW!!!" she cried. "Great! Now I'm tiny AND I have a broken leg! How can this get any worse?!"

Alicia curled up into a ball on the floor as she cried herself to sleep. It would be a while before anyone came to check in on her. Who would it be?
1112111222122212.title: Break a tiny leg

choices: Laura takes their money offering
Laura refuses the money
1112112.content:
"STOP!!!" Laura yelled in a booming voice to the crowd below, stomping her feet to get their attention. As the shock waves on the ground caused many of her admirers to either run in retreat or fall down, Laura thought she had successfully drove off the men taking pictures of giant, naked form. But she was wrong. If anything, there were even MORE people than earlier, causing the giantess to cry in frustration, falling to her knees.

"Why are you crying?" one of the guys asked the weeping giantess. "You should be happy you're big."

"Happy!? My house is destroyed, I'm butt-naked, and the whole town's male populace are taking pictures of me as if I was some stripper at a bar. What's there to be happy about!?"

"Well....you're pretty", he shyly told the girl.

"I guess...but pretty won't get me my house or dignity back."

"What if we paid you to get your picture taken?"

And with that, the man took out a $20 bill and placed it ten front in front of Laura. In fact, ALL the men started pulling large sums of money and started placing them in a pile next to the naked giantess. Both moved and disturbed by their offer, Laura decided whether or not to take such money in front of her. It had to at least be four or five thousand dollars: not enough to pay for the house, but enough to at least clothe her body once again.
1112112.title: Unwanted Attention

choices: A scientist
Laura's mother
11121122.content:
After much thinking, Laura turned down the money. Her current shock of the situation didn't allow her much else to think about, much less a bunch of drooling perverts who only offered their money to her to see her naked form. Laura blew on the money and sent it flying away, it raining town below her like rain drops. And with that she proceeded to walk away from town.

Of course, Laura's walk didn't last long, as she was soon spotted by practically half of the police force in the city right about then! And not only that, but they were holding guns and tranquilizers as well!

"What do you want from me?!" Laura nervously asked the cops below her naked feet.

"We want you to sit stomach down on the ground", one of the officers demanded through the use of a microphone and a sound system in his van. "We're not going to hurt you."

Reluctant to do much else, Laura slowly placed her body on the ground, tears of frustration rolling down her eyes. As she did, though, she felt another sneeze coming on and proceeded to do so. This time her legs were the next thing to grow, growing almost 15 feet longer, resulting in Laura's disproportional leg size versus the rest of her body. Police cars behind her already large feet were demolished and thrown into the air while Laura continuously apologized throughout. It was no use, though: Laura was soon put down by several sleep tranquilizers, and the now 46-47 foot tall giantess felt the world around her blurring into nothing as she fell into a deep trance.

---

Once she came to, Laura found herself in a big, white, empty room. She struggled to sit up, only to realize her arms were chained to the wall! So were her feet. In fact, she was sitting up flat against the wall, and the only other thing in the room besides herself (and a door) was the rainbow flower in the far right corner of the room. As Laura drooped her head down in worry, proceeding to cry, a person knocks on the door and greets Laura. It was..
11121122.title: Nobody's Idol

choices: Anthony takes notes of Laura's growth
Anthony informs his superiors as to what is happening
111211221.content:
As Laura drooped in shame over her being exposed like some sort of alien in a secret facility, a young scientist walked into the room. He looked to be about 28 or so years old (give or take a few years), and he had short blonde hair, green eyes, and a skinny build. His clothing attire consisted of a plain white shirt and jeans, and in his right hand was a marble notebook, his pens in his left pocket. As the scientist attempted to inch closer to Laura, the annoyed giantess just shouted for him to go away and to leave her alone. Quickly he sat down on the ground and started writing this in his notebook, barely phased by her emotional outburst.

"What are you writing?!", an inquisitive Laura asked the man, finally lifting her head up high enough from her knees to see him.

"Who are you? What am I doing here? When will I be freed?" she continued to ask the man as he wrote down notes in his notebook.

"Well, if you must know, I'm writing down data concerning your uneven growth spurts that occurred from, what we've gathered, the flower over there in the corner", replied the scientist as he pointed to said flower. "And if you must know, my name is Anthony and you're in Area 50."

"Don't you mean Area 51?"

"No...Area 50. We couldn't get the name rights to Area 51 in time", the scientist giggled, but Laura was not as amused.

"I'm sorry", Anthony sighed. "But it isn't my fault you're here. My superiors want to talk to you about this mysterious flower that can make living beings grow."

"You mean it works on things other than people?"

"It sure does, Miss. We tried on a cat earlier, and his tail grew to 5 times its regular size. We also tried it on a dog, and her nose tripled in height. However, it seems that eventually, the flower's effects wear off...the cat and dog's normal sizes have been restored recently."

"Then how come I'm still so big!?" Laura impatiently asked, trying to free herself once again from the shackles of the wall.

"Well, it seems the bigger the person is, the longer the effect takes to wear off..if we didn't gas you earlier, who knows how big you would be right now..", Anthony told a sad-looking Laura.

"Well...how long will THAT take!? And can I go home afterwards?"

"I'm afraid not. It could be days before your normal size is restored, and you'll either continue to grow or, even worse, shrink down to levels unimaginable.."

"But I don't want to be big-AH-AH-AH-CHOO!!" sneezed Laura, her head growing another foot or so as it bumped into the ceiling, causing her to rub her head in response.

"Oh no, not again..." Laura then meekly moaned to herself.
111211221.title: Further mysteries of the rainbow flower

choices: Laura is now hungry
Laura is feeling tired
1112112211.content:
"Wow! This is amazing!" Anthony said to himself as he continued to jot notes on his notebook, noticing the size difference of the growing woman before him. Laura, however, was more confused than anything as to why he showed no fear of her growing stature, and decided to ask just that.

"Aren't you scared of me, even a little bit..?"

"To tell you the truth, when I first heard of a woman the size of a house, I thought it was the most preposterous thing I've ever heard of. I've heard of women growing to heights as tall as even 8 feet, but over 30? I thought it made as much sense as Bigfoot shopping at a 7-11 in broad daylight."

"So...what does that have to do with you not being scared of me...?"

"I dunno...because I think you're cute?" Anthony smiled to the woman as he continued to jot down information on his notebook, attempting to make as little eye contact as possible with the woman as he could. Laura, meanwhile, looked down at her body and noticed that she was dressed. She was wearing a sleeveless purple shirt and a medium-length, pink skirt. And now that she thought of it, her hair seemed shorter, now barely halfway down her back.

"Oh, we cleaned and dressed you while you were asleep", pointed out Anthony to the confused woman as she looked at her clothed body. "They're made of a super elastic fiber, so they won't come off even if you grow to be 1,000 feet tall."

"Pervert", Laura sneered at the man, giving him a stare that intensified in its paralyzing ability due to her taller height.

"H-hey! I wasn't the one who dressed you! In fact, it was the women who work here that did that", Anthony defended himself by saying.

"Are you telling the truth, Anthony?"

"Y-yes, I am..."

"Then thank you", she smiled to the man, winking her left eye at him. "If my height ever gets restored, maybe we can hang out sometime...?"

"I don't see the harm in that. Sure thing", Anthony replied. Just then Laura extended her left big toe as much as she could out to the normal-sized scientist.

"Pinky foot promise?" she asked of the scientist, who then proceeded to place his own hands on the big toe in front of him.

"Promise", Anthony answered, attempting not to breathe in the smell of Laura's feet. Even after a shower they smelled quite a bit.
1112112211.title: An amused scientist

choices: ...her hands were smaller than the cuffs now.
...her hands were even bigger!
11121122111.content:
Laura felt her stomach rumble, which was louder than usual at her much bigger size. She then began to stare at the rainbow flower at the other side of the room, which was starting to look mighty tasty to the hungry giantess..

"Do you want me to get you something to eat?" Anthony asked the hungry woman, who then nodded up and down weakly in reply. She hadn't quite realized how fatigued she was until she tried escaping from her imprisonment, but the several attempts at doing so left her feeling all the weaker. Anthony excused himself from the room as he went to get an assortment of foods for the hungry woman in his care.

As the busy scientist went around collecting food, Laura decided to try one last time to break her hands from the wall. Even if she couldn't move her legs, she at least wanted to move her hands around more so she could hug Anthony for his hospitality for everything. Of course, a sudden sneeze made this a reality, as Laura's hands grew another 2 feet in size, and their increased size and strength allowed her to break free of the chains from the wall. Of course, the increased size of her hands was also suffocating them, as her hands were still in the back wall's handcuffs and were cutting of the circulation of air of her hands. Laura watched in horror as her hands turned purple before her, and the giantess could only whimper in pain at the intense pain she was feeling.

"Oh please stop!!!!" she screamed and cried in agony, banging her hands quite loudly on the wall behind her as she did so. Laura quickly grabbed hold of the rainbow flower and sniffed it profusely, hoping it would shrink her hands and free them from their imprisonment. As she felt another sneeze come and go through her, Laura soon realized that...
11121122111.title: Hungry, hungry Laura

choices: "...I could do for seconds."
"...no, not really."
111211221111.content:
Laura was relieved to find out that the pain in her hands had came to a halt, though they were now one-tenth the size they used to be, looking quite disproportionate to the rest of her body. Still, at least they weren't causing pain to the woman anymore! Wiping the tears from her eyes that came from the pain she felt earlier, Anthony finally re-showed himself to the much calmer giantess. He had brought a cart larger than himself and about 15 feet long, and it contained everything from fruits, vegetables, and even the odd piece here and there of junk food. He placed the cart right next to Laura's feet, who was smacking her lips in excitement of all the nice good in front of her.

"Wow, that's quite a lot of stuff", remarked Laura, wondering what to eat first as she picked up a whole bunch of bananas, peeled them, and ate all of them at once. She soon scarfed down dozens of pineapples, watermelons, oranges, bread, rice, chicken, and many more things. She then washed it down with a 10 gallon size bottle of water, then feeling very satisfied afterwards.

"I assume you enjoyed the meal?" Anthony shyly asked Laura uncertain as to whether or not she enjoyed the meal or only ate out of sheer desperation.

"Yes, it was quite good", Laura replied, patting the scientist gently on the head with her left hand. It was at this moment that the scientist discovered the smaller size of Laura's hands, which were shorter than his own now!

"I sneezed and they shrunk", she explained to him. "Sorry you weren't here to see it."

"That's all right. I'm sure I'll get to see more examples of your growing and shrinking as time passes on...if that's okay with you."

"It sure is", Laura smiled to the scientist. "But...can we move somewhere more scenic and open? I feel like a rat trapped in a cage here."

"Sorry, but until you shrink that's not an option. You're much too big to fit in the door or hallway."

"Well, if I do shrink to a small enough size to do so, promise me you'll take me outside", Laura suggested to Anthony, winking her right eye afterwards.

"Certainly", Anthony replied, blushing at the cute, blinking giantess before him. "I give you my word as a scientist. Are you still hungry, perhaps?"

"Actually, since you asked me..."
111211221111.title: Breathing comfortably again

choices: Andrew tells Laura to stop it
Andrew listens to Laura and stays with her
111211221112.content:
Laura's hands were now even bigger than before, now almost one-third the size of the rest of her body. This would normally be grotesque enough of an appearance as is, but her hands were also being squeezed more and more by the chains. Laura seriously felt like she was going to die right then and there, crying so much in pain that the room was starting to fill up with water.

"IT HURTS!!! IIT HURTS SO MUCH!!! OH PLEASE MAKE IT STOP!!!!" she screamed like a little child as she continued to slam her hands into the walls around her, hoping they would break the chains from their place from sheer force from being smacked the wall. Thankfully luck was on the upset giantess' side for a change, as Laura finally felt her hands freed from the chains. She then looked at her very discolored hands, which were very purple-red from the tight squeeze she had previously felt. Although now breathing comfortably, Laura could still feel the pain from their being tightened, and she was still crying (thought not as much as before) as her tears reached up the 3 foot mark of the room.

Unfortunately, this was not something Andrew was aware of when he opened the door to check up on the woman, getting drenched as the water went sailing down the hall. Not only did Laura's tears wet not only the rest of the floor, but it also seeped into every room on that floor, as well as the staircase below. Andrew found himself draining out the water from his clothes as a saddened Laura looked at him.

"Why are you crying?" he asked the sad woman as he closed the door behind him, then coming up to Laura and massaging her big left toe.

"The chains were cutting off the circulation of my hands. I thought they were going to fall off", a drooping Laura explained to Andrew as she then hugged him in a tight embrace with her hands, placing the scientist's head directly on her chest.

"I'm sorry to hear that, but I'm glad they're off of you. I hope you feel better now", he comforted the woman, stroking her long brown hair with his smaller hands.

"I do. Bless you", Laura whispered into his left ear as she kissed his forehead. "I'm so glad you're concerned about a freak like myself."

"You're not a freak, Laura! You're a beautiful woman, and I would say this if you were the size of a speck or the size of a planet! Don't be so hard on yourself." Laura proceeded to use her shirt to dry off the tears from earlier, feeling calmer now by the scientist's kind words.

"You're right, Andrew. So....do you have food for me?"

"I did, but....you wet the food and ruined most of it. I'll have to go get more, Laura." However, as Andrew proceeded to get off the giantess' lap, he found himself forced upon it once again.

"No! I don't want you to leave me!" she demanded, looking at him with a face that expressed both selfishness and worry. "Please....I'm scared."
111211221112.title: The pain of growth

choices: Laura somehow was her normal human size again (or close to it)
Laura was somehow only a few feet tall
1112112211121.content:
"Laura, you have to stop this! You're not a little kid!" an angry Andrew demanded of the giantess, surprised by her childish behavior. "Now let me go so I can get some food for you before you starve."

"NO!" she replied, placing the scientist in-between her legs and clenching them hard to prevent him from moving. "I won't let you leave! How do I know you're not going to gas me or put me sleep with the 'food' you're promising me!?"

"What the hell are you talking about, Laura!? Why would I drug you!?"

"Because that's how I got here in the first place! Because of you and your...AH-AH-AHCHOO!" And with that, Laura found another part of her body changing in size. This time it was her legs, which were now their default, original size (though her feet were still big, looking quite disproportionate in comparison). No longer trapped in the giantess' legs, Andrew made his escape to the door.

"Laura, I don't know what your problem is, but if you don't stop this behavior we really WILL have to put you to sleep by force", a pissed Andrew explained to the upset woman before him. "Now stay here and be quiet while I get you some food!" With that he closed the door and locked it, just in case Laura tried to get out. The upset woman, meanwhile, started sniffing the rainbow flower again, sniffing for a quite a while before Andrew made his return with a cart full of food, at least 15 feet long and 20 feet tall, taking a team of 10 people just to bring it to the door. But after opening the door he saw an unexpected sight before him...
1112112211121.title: No means No!

choices: Jennifer takes her chances and sniffs the flower
Jennifer listens to her brother and doesn't go near the flower
11121122111212.content:
Andrew was shocked by what he saw: the former giantess before him now a mere 3 feet tall. While it wasn't quite a perfect shrink (her hair was 2 feet long, her feet were a little bigger than they would normally be, her ears were almost two-thirds the size of her head, her chest was still fairly large considering her size, and her legs made up almost 75% of her body's height), it was still quite a sight that the former giantess was but the size of a girl barely a quarter of her age.

"Good thing these clothes change size with me", the woman sighed before the towering (to her) scientist, noticing the long cart of food before her. "Wow! That's a lot of food! Is that for the whole building's staff?"

"Actually...it was originally meant for you", Andrew explained, Laura gasping in shock.

"I-I-I could never eat that much! Even at 100 feet tall!"

"Well, we didn't know what foods you liked, so we got a little bit of everything", Andrew explained to the short woman before him before another scientist grabbed hold of her. She was about 5 foot 3, had short, brown hair, blue eyes, and a very skinny build (with a chest as flat as a plank of wood). Her clothing attire consisted of a plain white shirt and jeans, and she also wore glasses.

"Interesting", the woman said to herself. "She can shrink to this height as well?"

"Jennifer, stop it!" an annoyed Andrew told her. "Let her go!"

"Jennifer?" a confused Laura asked her holder. "Um, do you and Andrew happen to be...?"

"No, no, no. We're not lovers or anything. I'm his little sister", the female scientist smiled to her as she lifted the little woman above her head. "Wow you're a cutie! What's your name, little one?"

"Um....Laura", the nervous woman replied, scared to be 6 feet in the air, which to her looked almost double that size (and more than enough to kill her if she fell). "Laura Carley."

"My name is Jennifer! I'm a high school student currently working part time."

"Wow! High school! And you work part time here?" an amazed Laura asked of the girl, who blushed a little in response to what Laura said.

"I only work here part time with my big brother. They say someone my age can't work here full-time until they finish high school. Though that won't take too much longer since I'm in my last year." Jennifer then placed Laura back on the ground, sitting down on her butt so as to see her better.

"Jennifer, how old are you, if I may ask?" Laura asked of the bigger girl before her.

"16."

"Wow! And you're already graduating so soon!?"

"She skipped a grade or two back in elementary school", explained Andrew. "Jennifer's one of the smartest girls in the country. She even took the SATs recently and scored a near perfect score."

"Wow! You're really something!" Laura gasped in shock once again.

"Oh stop it! You're embarrassing me", Jennifer gushed as she hugged Laura in gratitude. "Though the really amazing one here is you! Look at you, so small and cute. I wish I could be that small."

"Well, why don't you just sniff the flower, Jennifer?" Laura asked the young scientist.

"Because that's a bad idea", chimed in Andrew. "Who knows what will happen to her if she does? She could shrink to the size of an ant or grow as large as the Statue of Liberty. Either way chaos might ensue."

"But you didn't think that with me, Andrew..", Laura added in, Jennifer nodding alongside her.

"Fine! Whatever. Take your chances, Jennifer!" Andrew grumbled to himself as he left the room. "Just remember, though: I warned you."
11121122111212.title: Little Laura

choices: Jennifer listens to Laura
Jennifer task the risk
111211221112121.content:
"I'll be fine. I promise", Jennifer comforted her brother as she took in a decent sized whiff of the flower. For a few moments there were no problems, and she felt fine. IT wasn't long before her eyes began to water, though, and soon enough she found out what the big deal was with the flower..

"AH-AH-AHCOO!!" she went, unaware of what the first growth (or shrink) would be. Jennifer first felt around her chest area to see if hr breasts got any bigger. After sighing a little, she then felt the rest of her body for anything that might have changed. Her prespective hadn't changed, and neither did her hair, butt, or chest, so that only left some part of her face.

"Can I have a mirror, Andrew?" his little sibling asked of him, watching him crack a big smile as he did so.

"What are you laughing about?" Jennifer asked him, unamuased by his laughing at her. "What could possible be so funnEH!!!?!?"

It was then that Jennifer found out what part of her body grew: her nose! It was thrice as big as it was before, and about twice as long as well.

"Oh great! How am I supposed to hide THIS for the next day or two!?" the grumpy girl asked herself. "It's like I'm a real life Pinocchio."

"Consider yourself lucky if that's the worst that happens", Laura told the young scientist. "What were you hoping it would be, anyway?"

"My chest. Or my hair", Jennifer grumbled. "Well, I guess it can't get any worse than this. I'm going to try to even this out!"

"No, Jennifer!!" warned Laura moments before the girl was about to sniff the flower once more.
111211221112121.title: Keep your big nose out of the flower!

choices: A part of Jennifer's body shrinks
A part of Jennifer's body grows
1112112211121212.content:
Jennifer once again proceeded to sneeze, hoping for another, better reaction. Once she sneezed she immediately started searching her body with her hands, hoping for some sort of change.

"Oh great! Now what grew on my face!?" the annoyed girl asked herself as she felt her hair and ears, which didn't seem any different than before. She then felt the sides of her face as well as her chin, but still nothing. It took a shocked look on Laura's face for her to eventually find out what grew...

"My eyes!!" the girl screamed as she noticed her big, gigantic eyes in the mirror, which were at least thrice their size now. "Gah! I look like an anime character!" At this point she also realized that her glasses no longer would work on the poor girl, so she decided to just threw them across the room, breaking them. Andrew, meanwhile, was pointing and laughing at this predicament.

"Great. Just great...", the young high school student sighed to herself as she picked up the flower and started to smell it once again. "Well....can't get any worse from here.."

"Yeah. Maybe your forehead will grow next!" Andrew teased as his sister hit him in the arm.
1112112211121212.title: My, what big eyes you have!

choices: Another part of Jennifer's body shrinks
Another part of Jennifer's body grows
11121122111212121.content:
Jennifer felt a little off following the next sneeze, which was soon followed by two quick sneezes soon after. A look in the mirror revealed her ears and eyes returning to their normal size, but her view with the ground below resulted in a much worse alternative for the poor girl.

"Where are my legs!?" the girl screamed as she fell on her butt and noticed her smaller, thinner legs after removing her pants (with Laura shooing Andrew out of the room). Jennifer felt really strange and unpleasant looking at her now 1 foot long legs, reducing the girl's heigh by a good 2 feet.

"This is why I warned you about", noted Laura. "This will probably continue until you shrink down to my size..or smaller, even."

"This is actually pretty cool, but..", commented Jennifer as she looked around the room and her tiny legs. "I can't even move with my 'big' feet in the way."

"I can fix that!" snickered Laura as she started tickling the girl's nose with her tiny fingers, causing the girl to whiff up another sneeze before she knew it...
11121122111212121.title: Jennifer's legs...going down!

choices: Laura accepts Jennifer's offer
Laura declines Jennifer's offer
111211221112122.content:
Jennifer decided to listen to her brother and not sniff the flower. She then put on a gas mask given to her by one of the other assistants in the room, her brother joining in soon after. The high school scientist apprentice then took the flower from the floor and slowly picked it up, placing it in a white box outside of Laura's room. She then closed the box on it and sealed up the 1'X1' box, which was soon followed by Andrew lifting it up and placing it down below at the research lab.

"Don't want to take any chances, huh?" Laura asked of Jennifer, whose tall size in comparison to her still kind of freaked her out.

"Nope. Though now I wish I could experiment with size changing myself.."

"Believe me, Jennifer. It's not as fun as you'd think it would be. You never know if you're going to grow bigger or smaller, and the sneezes can occur at an...ah-ah-AH-CHOO!"

Jennifer watched as Laura's legs grew another few inches in height, making the short woman now about 3 foot 5 or so in height now. It was still a long way to go from her original height (much less accurate proportions), but at least some process was getting done. Sort of.

"Hey, Laura. Why not stay with Andrew and I until your size is restored?" Jennifer asked Laura with a smile on her face. "We share a dorm with two separate bedrooms here in this research facility."

"I don't know, Jennifer. Wouldn't that be a burden on you and your brother to have me movie in, even temporarily?"

"Of course not! Besides, I want to see further examples of your size changing. I was extremely fascinated by your leg growth, and I wish to see more of that type of thing as your size gets restored. Who knows? Maybe I'll go down to the research lab and see its powers for myself.."

"I don't think you should, Jennifer. You promised Andrew you wouldn't."

"I know that! But...now I'm so tempted to try it. Argh! So, what do you say about staying with Andrew and me, anyway?"
111211221112122.title: Listening to Andrew

choices: Laura and Jennifer watch some T.V.
Laura and Jennifer get something to eat
1112112211121221.content:
Laura decided to take up Jennifer on her offer, and as soon as the box containing the rainbow flower was locked up safe and tight in a vault, the two headed off with Andrew back to her dorm. The dorm itself wasn't very elaborate, but it looked huge to the 3 and a half foot tall Laura. There was a big, flat-screen T.V. on the side of the room, with a couch about 10 feet or so away from it. The kitchen was about 15 feet away from the front door, and contained a microwave, oven, and dishwasher. The bedroom were about 20 feet or so away from there, with Andrew's room being on the left and Jennifer's on the right. Overall it didn't look too much different from an apartment.

"Who pays for all of this, anyway?" Laura wondered. "This dorm must be fairly expensive."

"I'll answer that", said Andrew. "You see, being an employee here I get to live here for free."

"But why does Jennifer live here, then? Doesn't she go to school?"

"I do, Laura", Jennifer took over from Andrew. "But the school is very close by to this building, so I'll just walk thee from here."

"But where are your parents then? You must get pretty lonely here.."

"Well...our parents are famous scientists as well, and they travel a lot to help people around the world", explained Jennifer. "So we don't see them often. Mainly for birthdays and Christmas."

"That sucks", stated Laura. "Still, at least you have a place to live."

"Yep. And now I have a new friend to talk with and hang around with!" squealed Jennifer as she lifted up Laura and hugged her. "I don't have many friends, so this is great!"

"I'm glad you think that way, JennifeAH-AH-ACHOO!"

"Eww", went Jennifer as she wiped the snot off of hr shirt from Laura's sneeze. After doing so, she noticed that Laura's feet seemed to be bigger, about the same size as her feet. Laura, too, noticed her enlarged feet, quickly releasing herself from Jennifer as she planted them on the ground.

info.brief_description: An allergic reaction causes a young woman to change height (uneven growth/shrink).
info.description:
Welcome to the first true uneven growth / shrink sequence story on writing.com (or one of the very few, anyway)! You won't find any of that instant poof growth / shrink here! Here you will read a story of a young, 19 year-old woman and the awkward growing and/or shrinking of various parts of her body. Here are some ground rules:

1.) Absolutely no instant growth / shrink (except through a foray of sneezes). I want this to be a gradual process. There are literally HUNDREDS of other stories on this site you can read if you want instant growth / shrink.

2.) Not a rule, but note that the flower can affect ANYTHING alive; men, women, even animals. Feel free to choose your victim after the opening chapters.

3.) When adding a new character, please describe him / her in some sort of detail so that I may add it to this page here.

4.) Clothes can't grow / shrink with the character, and no nasty / toilet stuff. Sex is okay if consensual and doesn't involve underage people.

5.) All chapters must be one paragraph long and written in third person (i.e. "Laura decided to sniff the flower"). Remember to add breaks between long paragraphs if possible. I'll edit for spelling if need be.

If you abide by the above and contribute, then thank you very much!

Update: 8/3/2009 150 chapters! Whoo! And 7,620 page views, on top of thatl! Awesome! Thank you very much Metafictional, Drybones, and King Dedede for contributing to this story over the months! I hope to one day get this to 200 chapters and expand (no pun intended) this story's view count to 10,000...and maybe beyond.

And now, here's some information on our heroine and her boyfriend, as well as some other characters:

Name: Laura Carley
Age: 19
Height: 5'8"
Weight: 130 pounds
Hair color: Brown, short cut
Eye color: Green
Usual attire: Light colored tank-top, dark colored shorts
Relatives: Mother (46), Father (47), older brother (23)
Bio: A spirited, energetic, slightly tomboyish college freshman who loves the outdoors. In a cruel bit of irony, though, she's allergic to many different kinds of flowers, and as such has a frustrating time enjoying said outdoors. She's been known to go into a sneezing fit whenever she smells a particular flower she's allergic to.

Bio: One of the many police officers of Laura's hometown, Jonathon discovers the rainbow flower after Laura grows to giantess proportions and runs away, leaving the flower behind. He takes the flower home to his wife as a present for their fifth wedding anniversary. Commonly a man of good morals, he feels guilty about taking the flower but was surprised still that it survived the crumbling of an entire house! He then tells himself that he will take it home, both as a present to his wife and to further interrogate it.

Bio: A girly girl if there ever was one, Alicia was raised since birth to be a proper lady and is usually extremely polite. She sometimes, however, finds herself embracing her childish, more tomboyish side, such as her love for racing, and even has a guy friend who likes her tomboyish side. She owns a white-and-black beagle named Oscar, who just turned three last month. Her family is fairy rich (her parents make $400,000 between them a year), but despite their wealth they live no differently than anyone else. Once a week her family gets together and do family activities, such as going to the movies or even skydiving. Her family is also into flowers, with a beautiful, award-winning flower garden in their own backyard. In fact, this is what prompts Alicia to take the rainbow flower in the first place: she wanted to give it to her parents to add to the garden.
